class.name: AttitudeEstimation
class.description: A plugin to estimate the attitude

class.name: ContactDetection
class.description: A plugin to detect foot contacts

class.name: ContactDataPackagingPlugin
class.description: A plugin to collect foot contact sensor data and aggregate them into our message type

class.name: LegOdometry
class.description: A plugin to calculate leg odometry

class.name: SensorFusion
class.description: A plugin to fuse the estimated attitude and the leg odometry
